comments.creator: bwinton@latte.ca
comments.author: bwinton@latte.ca
comments.raw_text:
So, I don't think Tomas's setup is that crazy, and in the interests of offering choice to the user (the way we check autoconfig.HOST before checking the isdpb) I think we should check that site, too.

I agree with the concerns about slowing down the process, but I think those could be mitigated by parallelizing the requests to the host and to the ispdb…
